title: Wishlist or do they exist?
question:
Couple of ideas I would like Rhino3D to do (maybe its already available)…






Click on the layer list and extract "%<LayerName(“xxxx”)>% as a copy option to then paste in a text box






In the layouts list have additional fields for users to enter data ie version number and a date plus have a filter system to hide (grey text) certain values ie date before 3rd Jan 2024 or “checked by”. This enbles filtering when generating a series of PDF saves and for general viewing. Such data is also transferable as %<LayoutField1(“xxxxxx”)>%






When generating leaders an option to extract the layer name of the part or block name into the leader text box.






Preview of a layout into another layout.






Sync Viewports in the layout section
